event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: At a convenient time, schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected resource(s), the identity of which can be determined using 'fmadm faulty'.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: Recoverable CRC errors have occurred in the interconnect between a memory buffer and its memory controller. No data has been lost; however, the number of CRC errors associated with this memory buffer-controller pair has exceeded acceptable levels.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: There is no more information available at this time.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: System performance may be impacted by a slight reduction in effective memory bandwidth.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: The system has recovered from the CRC errors.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: Memory link recoverable CRC errors exceeded acceptable levels
